pkgmetadata.longdescription: Play Minesweeper // Play and record games of minesweeper using a graphics device that supports event handling. Replay recorded games and save GIF animations of them. Based on classic minesweeper as detailed by Crow P. (1997) https://minesweepergame.com/math/a-mathematical-introduction- to-the-game-of-minesweeper-1997.pdf.
